name: Rain
description: Pokemon Emerald-style rain effect using rain sprite sheet

parameters.name: RainTexture
parameters.description: Rain sprite sheet texture (64x64 or 128x64 pixels with multiple frames)

parameters.name: RainSpriteSheetWidth
parameters.description: Width of rain sprite sheet in pixels

parameters.name: RainSpriteSheetHeight
parameters.description: Height of rain sprite sheet in pixels

parameters.name: RainFrameWidth
parameters.description: Width of each rain frame in pixels

parameters.name: RainFrameHeight
parameters.description: Height of each rain frame in pixels

parameters.name: RainDarkness
parameters.description: How much to darken the scene (0-1)

parameters.name: RainLayerCount
parameters.description: Number of rain layers (Pokemon Emerald uses 10 for normal, 16-24 for heavy)

parameters.name: RainMovement
parameters.description: Per-frame movement vector (diagonal: left and down)

parameters.name: Time
parameters.description: Time value for animation (update each frame)
